params.name: feature_size
params.description: The feature dimension of the extracted features. Use 1 for mono, 2 for stereo.

params.name: sampling_rate
params.description: The sampling rate at which the audio waveform should be digitalized expressed in hertz (Hz).

params.name: padding_value
params.description: The value that is used to fill the padding values.

params.name: chunk_length_s
params.description: If defined the audio is pre-processed into chunks of lengths chunk_length_s and then encoded.

params.name: overlap
params.description: Defines the overlap between each chunk. It is used to compute the chunk_stride using the followingformulae : int((1.0 - self.overlap) * self.chunk_length).
